title: [Bug Report] Crashes on app Split view
body:
Steps to Reproduce
1. Select any folder/file
2.  Click on the side 3 dont icon
3.  Click & hold Recent button for _split view_
4. Come back to Normal view
5. Choose any function besides **Cut** or **Copy**
App crashes
![Screenshot_2021-08-27-10-25-36](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48226312/131074730-e90c7f4d-0d5e-40ef-b9c8-1ce306571f45.jpeg)


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48226312/131075480-b1af23df-43be-4e9e-8590-8f691e633d3d.mp4
